price: 33. Ou alors diront-ils : « C’est lui qui l’a inventé. »[527] Or ce sont eux qui n’y croient pas.
arabic: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ تَقَوَّلَهُۥۚ بَل لَّا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
footnotes: [527] Il aurait, d’après eux, inventé le Coran.

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: am yaqūlūna taqawwalahu bal lā yu'minūna
